about_the_game:
◆Game Introduction:
What?! I just jerk off at home, and unexpectedly, I release the enchanting Succubus sealed for a thousand years.
Moreover, there's a curse that causes lifelong impotence after seven days?! In order to lift the impotence curse and reseal the Succubus, I had to wield my staff and give these Succubus a proper lesson !

◆Gameplay:
Special rhythmic gameplay requires players to follow the heartbeat's rhythm, utilizing various techniques from the 'Rhythm Sealing Technique' to attack the Succubus's weaknesses. When the Succubus exposes vulnerabilities, forcefully shoot the 'Sealing Man Power' into its weak points to seal it!

◆Game Features:

◇Perfect Fusion of Rhythm and Sex





◇The combination of gameplay and visuals provides players with an immersive experience.

◇Multiple Succubus await to be sealed.

◇Rich and humorous storyline with exciting CG scenes.

◇Full voice acting for all characters.

◇Practical memory control function.

content_descriptors.notes:
．All characters portrayed in this game are over the age of 20.
．This game contains a lot of sexual content .

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10+
  • Processor: 1.2+ GHz & SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10+
  • Processor: 1.2+ GHz & SSE2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: SexSeal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

In order to lift the impotence curse and reseal the enchanting Succubus, I had to wield my staff and give these Succubus a proper lesson...
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support
